reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed here with my girlfriend for my Birthday in June. It was okay. Not great, not bad. I think the reviewers on here must have met someone else, because I was expecting a warm & friendly owner (based on previous reviews) but he was okay. One thing I must mention is that the parking is minimal. If you arrive between 4:00pm - 6:00pm you'll have to park somewhere else as the owner goes out and his son refuses to move his car so you, as a guest(!) can park your own. All in all, I probably wouldn't stay here again. Not because it was dire, just that it is no better, or worse than most other B&B's around. Why a premium for vanilla when can get mint choc chip for the same price elsewhere?
reviews.title: Vanilla

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here on Friday and Saturday night, unfortunatly as we booked so late all the themed rooms were gone however the standard double was great. We were welcomed by the owner on our arival and he was very helpful and freindly throughout our stay. The guest house was very clean and it is located within walking distance to some excellent restuarnts (I highly recomend the log house), we would definatly stay here again to try out one of the themed rooms.
reviews.title: Fantasic Place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We took our friends here as their wedding present weekend away and we couldn't have been more impressed. Stayed in Arabian and African themed rooms which were really well furnished and decorated and always cleaned to a very high standard. The bathrooms were also lovely with spa bath to soak those aching muscles after a long walk (great for me at 8 months pregnant!!). Really handy location for the town and great walks! Richard the owner was extremely helpful and even lent us maps for our walks and told us good places to go walking and eat out at night. Great value and highly recommended.
reviews.title: Awesome guesthouse, great rooms, staff and location!
